sense.def:
To entertain someone
pomeni početi nekaj takega, kar koga zabava ali zanima.

seg.quote: We entertained the guests with a detailed description of the party.

sense.def:
To entertain someone
tudi pomeni nekomu ponuditi hrano in gostoljubnost, na primer v svojem domu.

seg.quote: He entertained all the eminent people.

sense.def:
To entertain an idea or suggestion
pomeni razmišljati o neki zamisli ali predlogu;

seg.quote: I wondered what could have led me to entertain so ludicrous a suspicion.
